Khonkolor::

The young loin mountain shot 25 times against  Divebomb
  ----=
- Original Message ----- 
  From: rAuq 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sen=
t: Monday, April 02, 2001 10:51 PM
  Subject: Re: Defending the Maximals!

=

  OOC: is the Element firing four EMP blasts, one missile, and five 
  pla=
sma blasts at each bot on the field?

  ::Razorclaw/Divebomb/Rampage::
  Ra=
zorclaw destroys the missiles being guided at Rippersnapper 
  with his lig=
htning gun in between dodging blasts, though a couple 
  are absorbed into =
his armour. He follows up by sending three more 
  lightning blasts at Mant=
le.

  Divebomb transforms, using his heightened agility to dodge straight =

  up many of the shots heading at him. Two of the shots smash into 
  his =
metallic wings, leaving charred marks, and almost knocking 
  him from the =
sky. His rocket boosters send him straight up at an 
  increasing speed, aw=
ay from the near battle.

  Rampage is so angry; consequently, he has lost =
"it". As one of the 
  laser blasts hits him, he dives to the ground, dodgi=
ng the missiles 
  and the rest of the shots. He transforms into tiger mode=
 as he hits 
  the ground. Immediately, he begins firing as much as he can,=
 
  pumping out continues rounds from his four leg mounted machine 
  guns =
at Astral, and the bots around him.



  On 2 Apr 2001, at 19:44, Jen D. wr=
ote:

  > (ooc: I'm not good at battles, so sorry if this is confusing :)
 =
 > 
  > 
  > Cyndro's scanners detected weaponfire outside the Element, and=
 quickly made 
  > a scan to find out who the attackers were. Soon he knew =
the location and 
  > weaponry of every Decepticon in the area.
  > 
  > "Y=
ou might wanna go out there and fight them, Rubble, we're under attack." 
 =
 > he says through a speaker to Rubble, who thanks him and runs out of the =

  > base. Cyndro reroutes more power to the shields, and then activates th=
e 
  > defences.
  > 
  > The round plate on top of the Element flashed sev=
eral times, and then a 
  > deafening screech was emmited over all comm fre=
quencees other than the ones 
  > that the Maximals were using. After a few=
 seconds, the screech shut off, and 
  > a jamming signal was sent out to d=
isable any communications that the enemies 
  > might have. During the scre=
ech, most of the weapons on the Element fired at 
  > the hopefully distrac=
ted bots, sending four EMP blasts, one missile, and 
  > five plasma shots =
at each one, other than the ones that were shielded by the 
  > Cybertronia=
n Fire (I think FireBlade is the only one shielded :).
  > 
  > 
  > Mantle=
 spun around when all the enemies arrived, and was immediately ready 
  > f=
or battle. He flew into the air and stretched out both arms. A missile flew=
 
  > out of each arm, both of them mentally guided by Mantle to hit 
  > R=
ippersnapper. Out of the corner of his eyes, Mantle could see Aqua firing 
=
  > his spear gun at Flesh Ripper, the same bot that he had tried to get du=
ring 
  > the last battle. Near him, Cinder was already firing at Rippersna=
pper. 
  > Mantle knew that Cinder wanted to impress Prowl, but he hoped th=
at she 
  > wouldn't do stupid things to show off.
  > 
  > "Allright, guys=
, we'll fight like this for a while, and then we'll form 
  > Element and c=
hase these guys out of here!" he said to his team over the 
  > commlink, w=
atching Rubble emerge from the Element with his missile launcher 
  > and f=
ire two missiles at Rampage. Mist flew by above him, firing three 
  > char=
ges down at Autofire.
